item.title: Lo Straniero / The Stranger
item.description: NOTE: I have found out that it is by a novel by Camus so I bet this stuff is already analysed well. But I write my thoughts on the movie for myself partially to remember it better and partially to analyze it better in the process of writing/watching. Also writing stuff is not a bad idea by itself. Comments were odd so I wasn’t excited to start watching it and delayed this movie.
